page.title: 12BP PLASTICS
page.content: BP Plastics sports and social club is a nice place to go. There is a football pitch and some swings and slides. There is a bar, a place to eat, tennis courts, bowling and it is near the sea. There is a car park, rugby pitches, cricket pitches and toilets. It is very nice on a hot day. There are some trees, shrubs and a lot of grass. The Sully community council have rented a half of it for the Sully Colts football teams to use and for other villages who want to use the facilities of the sports club.
